column4: I keep getting an error when trying to compile Xchat that GTK+ is incorrectly installed and  I don't know how to reinstall it. WHats the name of the lib I need?
why on earth are you compiling xchat?  xchat is in the repositories
Because it doesn't show up when I search for it
so ask THAT question...  Pastebin the output of: sudo apt-get update && apt-cache search -n xchat
